summary.para: Performs a hardmax function on each element of InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
The operator computes the hardmax (1 for the first occurrence of the largest value in the layer, and 0 for all other values) of each row in the given input.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_HARDMAX_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The tensor to read from for the input. This tensor must have an effective rank no greater than 2. The effective rank of a tensor is the DimensionCount of the tensor, excluding leftmost dimensions of size 1. For example a tensor size of { 1, 1, BatchCount, Width } is valid, and is equivalent to a tensor of sizes { BatchCount, Width }.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_HARDMAX_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.
